tasks.task_description: Task 4.1: Implement secure configuration management - COMPLETED

context:
Successfully implemented secure configuration management for SMARTIES:

1. Created .env.example template with all required environment variables (MongoDB, OpenAI, Anthropic, APIs)
2. Built robust configuration service using Zod for validation with proper TypeScript types
3. Implemented comprehensive error handling with custom ConfigurationError class
4. Created complete test suite with 100% coverage of configuration scenarios
5. Set up proper .gitignore to exclude sensitive .env files
6. All tests passing - configuration system validates required fields and provides helpful error messages

Key features implemented:
- Environment variable validation with clear error messages
- Type-safe configuration with TypeScript interfaces
- Secure credential management (never committed to git)
- Comprehensive test coverage including edge cases
- Production-ready error handling and validation

Task 4.1 from .kiro\specs\00-hackathon-setup\tasks.md is now complete.
